alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Hamilton; Marion; Meigs; Rhea; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 2:39AM CST until January 20 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM EST /10 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON EST /11 AM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle. An additional ice accumulation of a light glaze is possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 PM EST /10 PM CST/ this evening to noon EST /11 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Hamilton; Marion; Meigs; Rhea; Sequatchie
